meta.title: VINC Placement | Thailand's Premier Job Placement Agency for Japan | 10,000+ Workers Placed
meta.description: Since 1988, VINC Placement has connected 10,000+ skilled Thai workers with Japanese employers. From factory workers to engineers - we bridge Thailand and Japan with trusted workforce solutions.
meta.keywords: Thai workers Japan, Japan jobs Thailand, Thai job placement Japan, VINC Placement Bangkok, Thai workers Japanese companies

about.title: About VINC Placement
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner Since 1988
about.description: Since 1988, VINC Placement has been Thailand's most trusted partner for Japanese job placement. We've successfully placed over 10,000 Thai workers in Japan - from factory floors to engineering firms. With 35+ years of experience, we understand both Thai workers' dreams and Japanese employers' standards.
about.quote: Thai workers bring exceptional dedication, skill, and reliability to Japanese workplaces. Our mission is simple: create life-changing opportunities for Thai talent while delivering excellence to Japanese companies.
about.achievement: In the past five years alone, we've placed 10,000+ Thai workers with Japanese employers across all industries - maintaining our 35-year reputation for quality, cultural understanding, and lasting success.
about.expertise_description: No matter your skill level or industry, we have opportunities in Japan for you:

why_choose_items.title: 35+ Years of Trust

why_choose_items.title: Fair Treatment
why_choose_items.description: We only work with reputable Japanese employers who respect Thai workers
